after-you-have-completed-the-setup-you-c: After you have completed the setup, you can generate a token and use it to send emails through the API.

errors.config-not-set: `app:config` is not set in STORE KV, please set it before start using the service
errors.missing-env: Missing STORE environment binding, please use Cloudflare's dashboard to bind a KV namespace to the Cloudflare Pages project.
errors.no-jwt: No JWT provided in authorization header
errors.not-allowed: The email address of the sender is not in allowlist

hermes-description: Hermes is a open-source edge email sending service, which is designed to be easy to setup and use.
saperate-each-email-with-a-comma: Saperate each email with a comma (,)
senders-email-must-match-the-allowlist-t: Sender's email must match the allowlist to be allowed to send emails.
the-setup-is-very-easy-and-all-steps-can: The setup is very easy and all steps can be done directly in your browser.
you-can-use-it-to-send-emails-from-your-: You can use it to send emails from your own domain managed by Cloudflare.
